resources.personal_description: You can share your location with anyone's quick, easy and anonymous
resources.group_description: Group monitoring allows all group members to share location, waypoints and tracks from a variety of devices and applications in real-time. Create groups for family, camping, or competitions, other events.
resources.family_description: Special groups for use every day. You will always know where your husband and children.
resources.journey_description: New types of groups, convenient for travel. Shows all history of your movements from beginning to end.
resources.contest_description: A new group specially for various competitions related to navigation or moving over long distances.
resources.intro: OsMo uses tens of thousands of people, someone every day, someone in need. Our service allows you to be closer to each other :)
